item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Apache Log4j Vulnerability https://support.lenovo.com/ca/en/product_security/len-76573 Community Resources Resource Link Apache Log4j Vulnerability https://support.lenovo.com/ca/en/product_security/len-76573 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-44228: Vulnerable NCSC-NL “Nutanix and VMware components only; hardware not affected. See <a href=““https://download.nutanix.com/alerts/Security_Advisory_0023.pdf"" rel=““nofollow”">Nutanixand <a href=““https://www.vmware.com/security/advisories/VMSA-2021-0028.html"" rel=““nofollow”">VMWareadvisories.” CISAGov Nutanix and VMware components only; hardware not affected.
